name: Task Architect
description: Organize and manage your tasks in Notion so you can stop procrastinating and get more doneTask Architect is an unparalleled task system designed around the Eisenhower Matrix to help you prioritize your high value tasks so you can stop procrastinating and get to the bottom of your to do lists.See a the full preview of Task Architect here https://gettaskarchitect.com/Task Architect is for you if... You're consistently procrastinating Struggling to prioritize and value tasks You're disorganized and
features: You're consistently procrastinating; Struggling to prioritize and value tasks; You're disorganized and stuck with task management; Quick uploadtasks to master database based on area or project; Prioritize tasksby urgency/importance to process them; Choose one of four things to dowith the task:1. Do2. Delegate3. Schedule4. Delete; Progress down the dashboard tomanage delegated or scheduled tasks; Get more doneby letting Task Architectautomate the way you prioritize tasks.
